gcode.end_gcode:
M104 S0 ; turn off extruder heating
M140 S0 ; turn off bed heating
M107 ; turn off fans
G91 ; relative positioning
G0 Z+0.5 ; move Z up a tiny bit
G90 ; absolute positioning
G0 X135 Y105 F{machine_max_speed_x[0]*60} ; move extruder to center position
G0 Z190.5 F{machine_max_speed_z[0]*60} ; lower the plattform to Z min
M84 ; steppers off
G90 ; absolute positioning

0.4.start_gcode:
G21 ; metric values
G90 ; absolute positioning
M82 ; set extruder to absolute mode
M140 S[first_layer_bed_temperature] ; set bed temp
G28 X0 Y0 ; home X and Y
G28 Z0 ; home Z
G1 Z30 F{machine_max_speed_z[0]*60} ; move Z a bit down to not blow on the bed edge while heating
G1 X10 F3900 ; let some space on x to prevent the filament cooling exhaust from beeing blocked by the servo motor
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; wait for bed temp
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; set extruder temp
M106 S80 ; turn on fan to prevent air nozzle melt while heating up
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; wait for extruder temp
M107 ; start with the fan off
G28 X0 ; goto X home again
G92 E0 ; zero the extruded length
G1 Z0.2 F360 ; move plattform upwards
; extrude material next to the plattform (comment or remove following lines to disable)
G1 F180 E20 ; extrude some material next to the plattform
G92 E0 ; zero the extruded length
G1 E-[retraction_length] F{retraction_speed[0]*60} ; do a filament retract
G92 E0 ; zero the extruded length again
G1 X5 F3900 ; move sideways to get rid of that string
G1 E[retraction_length] F{retraction_speed[0]*60} ; do a filament deretract with retract parameters
G92 E0 ; zero the extruded length again
; draw intro line (comment or remove following lines to disable)
G1 X30 E5 F700 ; draw intro line
G92 E0 ; zero the extruded length
G1 E-[retraction_length] F{retraction_speed[0]*60} ; do a filament retract
G1 X40 Z2.0 ; move away from the introline
G92 E0 ; zero the extruded length again
G1 E[retraction_length] F{retraction_speed[0]*60} ; do a filament deretract with retract parameters
; end of intro line code
M117 Printing...
G5
